original: sbyang ba dang rgyas pa dang rab tu 'bar pa dang bdud rtsir byas nas khro bo la sogs pa rnams la sngags pas sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyang ba dang rgyas pa dang rab tu 'bar pa dang bdud rtsir byas nas khro bo la sogs pa rnams la sngags pas sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the individual bali offerings should be purified, increased, made radiant, and transformed into nectar, and then the mantrin should offer them to the wrathful ones and so forth.

original: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi chog thams cad la thun mtshams bzhir slob dpon gyis gtor ma byin te de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi chog thams cad la thun mtshams bzhir slob dpon gyis gtor ma byin te de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
translated: Likewise, in all the maṇḍala rites, the master should offer the bali in the four sessions, and then request their departure.

original: gshegs su gsol ba'i dus su gsang ba'i 'khor lor ham yig la khro bo'i 'khor lo gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: gshegs su gsol ba'i dus su gsang ba'i 'khor lor ham yig la khro bo'i 'khor lo gzhug par bya'o //
translated: At the time of requesting their departure, one should cause the wheel of wrathful ones to enter into the syllable haṃ in the secret wheel.

original: gtsug tor du aom yig la zad par stong pa la sogs pa'i 'khor lo dang / dpral bar ai yig la phyogs skyong ba'i 'khor lo dang / mgrin par ri yig la gza'i 'khor lo dang / snying gar au yig la ku'i 'khor lo dang /
analyzed: gtsug tor du aom yig la zad par stong pa la sogs pa'i 'khor lo dang / dpral bar ai yig la phyogs skyong ba'i 'khor lo dang / mgrin par ri yig la gza'i 'khor lo dang / snying gar au yig la ku'i 'khor lo dang /
translated: In the uṣṇīṣa, one should cause the wheel of the all-encompassing emptiness, and so forth, to enter into the syllable oṃ; in the forehead, the wheel of the directional guardians to enter into the syllable ai; in the throat, the wheel of the planets to enter into the syllable ri; in the heart, the wheel of the kumbhāṇḍas to enter into the syllable u;

original: lte bar li yig la 'byung po'i 'khor lo gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: lte bar li yig la 'byung po'i 'khor lo gzhug par bya'o //
translated: and in the navel, the wheel of the bhūtas to enter into the syllable li.

original: gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga rdzogs nas de'i 'og tu sngags pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas sa yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga rdzogs nas de'i 'og tu sngags pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas sa yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: After completing the rite of requesting their departure, the mantrin should then take possession of the ground with the procedure that will be explained. This is the rule.

original: da ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sa sbyang ba'i don du sa'i lha mo spyan drang ba gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sa sbyang ba'i don du sa'i lha mo spyan drang ba gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to purify the stage by means of the concentration to be explained, it is said that the goddess of the stage is invoked.

original: 'dir sa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sa'i lha mo spyan drangs nas dza:h'um bam ho:zhes pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis sngar brjod pa'i mchod yon gyi snod kyi chu dang bcas pa'i me tog mchod yon gyi dri la sogs pa dang bcas pa dag gis 'di la mchod🔽@107a * // yon rab tu sbyin no //
analyzed: 'dir sa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sa'i lha mo spyan drangs nas dza:h'um bam ho:zhes pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis sngar brjod pa'i mchod yon gyi snod kyi chu dang bcas pa'i me tog mchod yon gyi dri la sogs pa dang bcas pa dag gis 'di la mchod @107a * // yon rab tu sbyin no //
translated: Here, having invoked the goddess of the stage by means of the concentration of the stage, with these mantra syllables jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ, one should offer her the water in the vessel of welcome mentioned above, together with flowers, water for welcoming, scents, and so on.🔽One should make supplications to her, and then, as one wishes, purify the site.

original: de la gsol ba btab ste phyi nas sa yi gnas la dag pa dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa mdzod ces pa la 'dir gsol ba gdab pa ni rgyal bas lha yi bdag po dang bcas bdud ni bcom pa dag la lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur
analyzed: de la gsol ba btab ste phyi nas sa yi gnas la dag pa dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa mdzod ces pa la 'dir gsol ba gdab pa ni rgyal bas lha yi bdag po dang bcas bdud ni bcom pa dag la lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur
translated: Here, the supplication is as follows: “O goddess, you have been victorious over the māras together with the lords of the gods.

original: // de phyir khyod ni mchod par bya yis lha mchog gis btung bzhes shig bzhes shig bdag gi mchod yon no zhes pas bstod nas de la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /

translated: Therefore, you are to be worshipped. Drink the supreme drink, drink, drink my libation. Having praised him, one should request him.

original: ji ltar rgyal bas byang chub slad du bdud kyi sde ni stobs ldan dag kyang rab tu bcom gyur pa //
analyzed: ji ltar rgyal bas byang chub slad du bdud kyi sde ni stobs ldan dag kyang rab tu bcom gyur pa //
translated: Just as the Victorious One completely defeated the powerful hosts of demons for the sake of enlightenment,

original: de bzhin bdag gis kyang ni slob ma rnams la dbang bskur slad du bdud rnams nyams pa dag tu bya khyod dbang du gyur pas so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin bdag gis kyang ni slob ma rnams la dbang bskur slad du bdud rnams nyams pa dag tu bya khyod dbang du gyur pas so zhes pa'o //
translated: in the same way, I too will defeat the demons for the sake of conferring empowerment on the disciples.

original: de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams la 'chad par 'gyur pa'i mchod pa byas shing /
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams la 'chad par 'gyur pa'i mchod pa byas shing /
translated: Then, having made the offerings to the Buddhas and so forth as will be explained,

original: mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
analyzed: mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
translated: and having offered the libation and so forth, one should request.

original: 'dir gsol ba gdab pa ni gang dag phyogs rnams kun na sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa rnam bral btsun mo dang bcas pa //
analyzed: 'dir gsol ba gdab pa ni gang dag phyogs rnams kun na sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa rnam bral btsun mo dang bcas pa //
translated: Here, the request is: You who are free from faults, together with your queens, Buddhas and Bodhisattvas in all directions,

original: de dag rnams kyi mchog gi thugs rjes dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur slad du bdag la bskyang du gsol //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi mchog gi thugs rjes dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur slad du bdag la bskyang du gsol //
translated: By the supreme compassion of those, may they protect me in order to confer initiation into the maṇḍala.

original: de dag kun la gsol ba btab nas seng ldeng rang bzhin sra ba'i phur bu rnams kyis sa la gdab ste 'chad par 'gyur pa'i rim pas so zhes pa ni gsol ba gdab pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de dag kun la gsol ba btab nas seng ldeng rang bzhin sra ba'i phur bu rnams kyis sa la gdab ste 'chad par 'gyur pa'i rim pas so zhes pa ni gsol ba gdab pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: Having made requests to all of them, one should drive in the stakes made of kṛṣṇa wood into the ground, and [one should] recite the mantra in the sequence that will be explained. This is the rule for making requests.

original: de ltar gsungs pa'i khro bo mtshon cha dang ldan pa rnams ni /
analyzed: de ltar gsungs pa'i khro bo mtshon cha dang ldan pa rnams ni /
translated: The wrathful ones who are said to be armed with weapons

original: phyogs bcu'i cha ru sa la phur bus gdab pa dang / bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i cha ru sa la phur bus gdab pa dang / bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
translated: are to be driven in with the stakes into the ground in the ten directions, and they are to be set out for the purpose of protection. This is the rule.

original: da ni sa brko ba'i mtshan ma gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni sa brko ba'i mtshan ma gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the signs of digging the ground are stated:

original: 'dir sa'i snying por zug rdul sogs pa nges par zhugs gyur na /
analyzed: 'dir sa'i snying por zug rdul sogs pa nges par zhugs gyur na /
translated: Here, if a thorn and so forth definitely enters into the essence of the ground,

original: dge ba'i las bgegs byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dge ba'i las bgegs byed par 'gyur te /
translated: it will obstruct the virtuous karma;

original: de'i phyir sbyang ba bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sbyang ba bya'o //
translated: therefore, it should be purified.

original: zug rngu ni mi'i rus pa'am ;
analyzed: zug rngu ni mi'i rus pa'am ;
translated: A thorn is a human bone

original: sol ba dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: sol ba dang bcas pa ste /
translated: together with charcoal.

original: sol ba'am rva ni thun mong du dge ba'i las la 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed de /
analyzed: sol ba'am rva ni thun mong du dge ba'i las la 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed de /
translated: Charcoal or horn are the common [omens] for virtuous actions.

original: gnas de rnams su rnam par nyams par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnas de rnams su rnam par nyams par 'gyur te /
translated: One should purify those places.

original: de phyir 'dir ni yon tan dbang gis sbyang bar bya'o //🔽ci ste sa la rin chen nam /
analyzed: de phyir 'dir ni yon tan dbang gis sbyang bar bya'o // ci ste sa la rin chen nam /
translated: Therefore, here [the purification] is by the power of the qualities.

original: dung ngam / @107b mching bu mthong na de'i tshe bde ba byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dung ngam / @107b mching bu mthong na de'i tshe bde ba byed par 'gyur te /
translated: If one sees a jewel, a conch, or a crystal on the ground, then at that time one will experience happiness.

original: dkyil 'khor dag gi don du'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dag gi don du'o //
translated: [This is] for the sake of the maṇḍala.

original: de bzhin du khang bzangs don dang / khyim gyi don dang / rab gsal nges par 'dir ni mchod sbyin la sogs ched du'o zhes pa ni gnas sbyang ba'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du khang bzangs don dang / khyim gyi don dang / rab gsal nges par 'dir ni mchod sbyin la sogs ched du'o zhes pa ni gnas sbyang ba'i nges pa'o //
translated: Similarly, for the sake of a mansion, for the sake of a house, and for the sake of a tower, [this is] certainly for the sake of a sacrifice and so forth. This is the determination of the purification of the site.

original: da ni sa sbyang ba'i don du nyi ma gsungs pa rdzogs pa dag la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni sa sbyang ba'i don du nyi ma gsungs pa rdzogs pa dag la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, in order to purify the ground, the days are stated: on the full [moon] days, etc.

original: 'dir zla ba so so la rdzogs pa drug ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'dir zla ba so so la rdzogs pa drug ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Here, the six full [moon] days of each month are as follows:

original: lnga pa gnyis dang bcu pa gnyis dang bco lnga pa gnyis te /
analyzed: lnga pa gnyis dang bcu pa gnyis dang bco lnga pa gnyis te /
translated: the two fives, the two tens, and the two fifteenths.

original: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i slad du dus kyi mtshams shes shing dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las shes nas so //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i slad du dus kyi mtshams shes shing dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las shes nas so //
translated: In order to draw the maṇḍala, one should know the time and know virtuous and non-virtuous karma.

original: 'dir dge ba'i las la dkar po'i lnga pa dang / bcu pa dang / bco lnga pa la pishti spangs nas sa sbyang bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir dge ba'i las la dkar po'i lnga pa dang / bcu pa dang / bco lnga pa la pishti spangs nas sa sbyang bar bya ste /
translated: Here, one should purify the ground, abandoning the white five, ten, and fifteen, which are virtuous karmas.

original: de nas sngar gsungs pa'i sas dgang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sngar gsungs pa'i sas dgang bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should fill it with the previously mentioned earth.

original: mi dge ba'i las la nag po'i lnga pa dang / bcu pa dang / gnam stong ste /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i las la nag po'i lnga pa dang / bcu pa dang / gnam stong ste /
translated: For non-virtuous karma, it is the black five, ten, and thirtieth.

original: zla ba nyams pa las sbyang bar bya zhing ;
analyzed: zla ba nyams pa las sbyang bar bya zhing ;
translated: One should purify from the waning moon.

original: sngar gsungs pa'i sas dgang bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngar gsungs pa'i sas dgang bar bya'o //
translated: And one should fill it with the previously mentioned earth.

original: de nas sa gzung ba dag kyang ste /
analyzed: de nas sa gzung ba dag kyang ste /
translated: Then, one should also take possession of the ground.

original: mchod pa la sogs pa rdzogs pa la'o //
analyzed: mchod pa la sogs pa rdzogs pa la'o //
translated: For the completion of the offerings, and so on.

original: bu rnams dag ni ste slob ma rnams yang dag par bsdu ba ni rdzogs pa la'o //
analyzed: bu rnams dag ni ste slob ma rnams yang dag par bsdu ba ni rdzogs pa la'o //
translated: Gathering the disciples, the sons, is for the completion.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus shes nas /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus shes nas /
translated: Then, knowing the time for drawing the maṇḍala,

original: bcu gnyis pa la thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: one should lay out the lines on the twelfth.

original: 'dod pa ma nu'i nyin zhag dag la zhes pa bcu gsum pa dang / bcu bzhi pa la dpal ldan rdul tshon dgye bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa ma nu'i nyin zhag dag la zhes pa bcu gsum pa dang / bcu bzhi pa la dpal ldan rdul tshon dgye bar bya'o //
translated: On the days of the waning moon, one should arrange the glorious colored powders on the thirteenth and fourteenth days.

original: dbang la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur pa ni /
analyzed: dbang la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur pa ni /
translated: The initiations and so forth will be explained.

original: nyal mchog gi bla mas sbyin te zhes pa lung gi tshig go //
analyzed: nyal mchog gi bla mas sbyin te zhes pa lung gi tshig go //
translated: The guru of supreme practice gives the gift, as stated in the scriptures.

original: bdud ni bcom pa'i nyin zhag dag la yang ste /
analyzed: bdud ni bcom pa'i nyin zhag dag la yang ste /
translated: On the days of the destruction of Mara,

original: yam yig gis nya gzhan la yang sbyin no zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: yam yig gis nya gzhan la yang sbyin no zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: and on other new moon days with the syllable yam, one should give, it is said. This is the rule.

original: de bzhin du sku gzugs la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du sku gzugs la sogs pa ni /
translated: Similarly, the images and so forth,

original: nya de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyal ba'i rigs la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: nya de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyal ba'i rigs la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: on that very new moon night, will be consecrated in the lineage of the Victorious Ones.

original: mtshan mo gzhan la rab gnas min zhes pa ni nges pa'o ;
analyzed: mtshan mo gzhan la rab gnas min zhes pa ni nges pa'o ;
translated: They are not consecrated on other nights, it is said. This is the rule.

original: / de nas dag pa'i dus sbyor gza' la sogs pas mi yi bdag po mtshan mo gzhan la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / de nas dag pa'i dus sbyor gza' la sogs pas mi yi bdag po mtshan mo gzhan la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, on another night, the lord of men will be consecrated by the pure planetary hours and so forth.

original: srog ste phur bu dang pa sangs nub par gyur zhes pa /
analyzed: srog ste phur bu dang pa sangs nub par gyur zhes pa /
translated: When the life-force, that is, Mercury and Venus, have set,

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs na de'i tshe ste /
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs na de'i tshe ste /
translated: when they have entered the orb of the sun, then

original: zla ba de la nges par ni mtha' @108a * //
analyzed: zla ba de la nges par ni mtha' @108a * //
translated: In that month, it is certain that the end🔽

original: gcig tu bag ma dang rab tu gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gcig tu bag ma dang rab tu gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: In that month, it is certain that the bride will not be established in one place.

original: de bzhin du rgyal dang nag pa'i nyal phur bu'i zhing du nyi ma zhugs par gyur pa ni 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyal dang nag pa'i nyal phur bu'i zhing du nyi ma zhugs par gyur pa ni 'gyur te /
translated: Similarly, the sun enters the sign of Cancer and the sign of Capricorn.

original: rgyal la rgyal por nams kyi dbang bskur ba dang / rag pa la sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal la rgyal por nams kyi dbang bskur ba dang / rag pa la sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: The sun enters the sign of Cancer for the coronation of the king, and the sign of Capricorn for the coronation of the Buddha. This is certain.

original: de ltar slob dpon dag gis sa gzhi'i gnas su 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang mtha' dag shes nas ni /
analyzed: de ltar slob dpon dag gis sa gzhi'i gnas su 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang mtha' dag shes nas ni /
translated: Thus, the teachers, having understood all the mundane and supramundane matters of the earth,

original: zhi ba la sogs pa'i bya ba gang gang byed pa de de mtha' dag de ltar 'bras bu dag ni rab tu sbyin par 'gyur zhes pa ni tshes kyi nges pa ste /
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs pa'i bya ba gang gang byed pa de de mtha' dag de ltar 'bras bu dag ni rab tu sbyin par 'gyur zhes pa ni tshes kyi nges pa ste /
translated: whatever pacifying and other rites they perform, all of those will be fruitful in that way. This is the certainty of the lunar days.

original: de bzhin du drag po'i las ni mi dge ba'i nyin zhag la nges pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du drag po'i las ni mi dge ba'i nyin zhag la nges pa'o //
translated: Similarly, violent rites are certain on the days of non-virtue.

original: da ni slob ma bsrung ba'i cho ga gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni slob ma bsrung ba'i cho ga gsungs te /
translated: Now, the ritual for protecting the disciple is stated.

original: 'dir dang por slob ma la sogs pa bsrung bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir dang por slob ma la sogs pa bsrung bar bya ste /
translated: Here, first one should protect the disciples and so forth.

original: phyi nas slob ma la sogs pa bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyi nas slob ma la sogs pa bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: Afterwards, one should gather the disciples and so forth.

original: 'dir rgyal ba la sogs pa lha mo rnams te gnyi ga'i rigs su gyur pa dag gis bsrung ba ni mgo bor a'u yig dang / snying gar a'i yig dang / gtsug tor du a'a yig dang / lte bar l'i yig dang / mgrin par r'i yig dang /
analyzed: 'dir rgyal ba la sogs pa lha mo rnams te gnyi ga'i rigs su gyur pa dag gis bsrung ba ni mgo bor a'u yig dang / snying gar a'i yig dang / gtsug tor du a'a yig dang / lte bar l'i yig dang / mgrin par r'i yig dang /
translated: Here, the goddesses such as Jayā, who are of both types, protect with the letter Ū on the head, the letter A at the heart, the letter Ā at the uṣṇīṣa, the letter Ļ at the navel, the letter Ļ at the throat,

original: gnas par a'a:yig ste gnyi ga'i rigs su gyur pa sku gsung thugs kyis phye ba dag gis zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gnas par a'a:yig ste gnyi ga'i rigs su gyur pa sku gsung thugs kyis phye ba dag gis zhes pa'o //
translated: and the letter Ļ at the secret place. They are of both types, divided into body, speech, and mind.

original: de bzhin sku gzugs sogs dang / glegs bam rnams ni rab gsal nges pa'i dpal ldan dbyangs rnams dag gis zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin sku gzugs sogs dang / glegs bam rnams ni rab gsal nges pa'i dpal ldan dbyangs rnams dag gis zhes pa ste /
translated: Likewise, the images and so forth, and the books, are protected by the clear, definite, glorious vowels.

original: aa ai ri au li zhes pa dbyangs lnga po rnams kyis bsrung ba byas nas /
analyzed: aa ai ri au li zhes pa dbyangs lnga po rnams kyis bsrung ba byas nas /
translated: Having protected with the five vowels, A, I, Ṛ, U, and Ļ,

original: de'i rjes la sangs rgyas rnams la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la sangs rgyas rnams la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
translated: afterwards one should supplicate the buddhas.

original: sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du che ge mo bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'dri bar bgyid do //
analyzed: sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du che ge mo bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'dri bar bgyid do //
translated: For the sake of the liberation of sentient beings, I, so-and-so, will draw the maṇḍala of Bhagavān Kālacakra.🔽Therefore, may the buddhas and bodhisattvas bless the disciples and so on.

original: de'i phyir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis slob ma la sogs pa rnams byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol zhes pa ni gsol ba gdab pa'i nges pa dang bsrung ba'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis slob ma la sogs pa rnams byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol zhes pa ni gsol ba gdab pa'i nges pa dang bsrung ba'i nges pa'o //
translated: This is the certainty of supplicating and the certainty of protection.

original: da ni gang zhig 'chad par 'gyur pas rgyas par brjod par bya ba thig skud la sogs pa'i lhag par gnas pa la sogs pa mdor bsdus pas gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni gang zhig 'chad par 'gyur pas rgyas par brjod par bya ba thig skud la sogs pa'i lhag par gnas pa la sogs pa mdor bsdus pas gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to explain in detail what is to be explained, the consecration of the strings and so on, he teaches in brief:

original: dag pa'i gnas ni legs par gang zhing shin tu mnyam par bkod @108b pa gru bzhi cung zad rus sbal rgyab bzhin mtho ba la /
analyzed: dag pa'i gnas ni legs par gang zhing shin tu mnyam par bkod @108b pa gru bzhi cung zad rus sbal rgyab bzhin mtho ba la /
translated: The pure site is well filled and arranged with even parts, square, and slightly raised like the back of a tortoise.

original: khru tshad gcig la sogs pa dus dang nor dang mi bdag ces pa khru bzhi dang khru brgyad dang khru bcu drug ste de bzhin du stong phrag gi bar gyi tshad kyi gnas gang ba de la lhar thig skud dang gshin rjer rdo rje dang /
analyzed: khru tshad gcig la sogs pa dus dang nor dang mi bdag ces pa khru bzhi dang khru brgyad dang khru bcu drug ste de bzhin du stong phrag gi bar gyi tshad kyi gnas gang ba de la lhar thig skud dang gshin rjer rdo rje dang /
translated: One cubit and so on, time, wealth, and the lord of men, that is, four cubits, eight cubits, and sixteen cubits, and so on up to a thousand cubits, in whatever place the thread for the deity, the vajra for the Lord of Death,

original: chur rdul tshon gyi snod dang byang du rdo rje dril bu dang / dbus su rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa bkod nas de'i rjes la 'chad par 'gyur pa'i rim pas gnyid log ste /
analyzed: chur rdul tshon gyi snod dang byang du rdo rje dril bu dang / dbus su rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa bkod nas de'i rjes la 'chad par 'gyur pa'i rim pas gnyid log ste /
translated: the vessel for the colored powders for the water, the vajra and bell for the north, and the victorious vase for the center are arranged, the master and the disciple should fall asleep in the sequence to be explained.

original: gang gi tshe slob dpon nam slob mas mtshan rnyed pa de'i tshe mtshan ma rnyed na dang po ste shar gyi phyogs dang / phyi ma ste nub kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya ste bla ma dang slob ma dag gis so zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe slob dpon nam slob mas mtshan rnyed pa de'i tshe mtshan ma rnyed na dang po ste shar gyi phyogs dang / phyi ma ste nub kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya ste bla ma dang slob ma dag gis so zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: When the master or the disciple obtains a sign, then if the sign is obtained in the first, that is, the eastern direction, and the last, that is, the western direction, the thread for the maṇḍala should be cast by the guru and the disciple.

original: da ni mtshan ma ngan pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni mtshan ma ngan pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs te /
translated: Now, the characteristics of an inauspicious sign are stated.

original: 'dir thig skud chad par gyur pa na bla ma nyams par 'gyur zhing yongs 'joms 'gongs par gyur na bu rnams dag kyang nyams par 'gyur ro ;🔽/ gal te rdul tshon rlung gis khyer na zhes pa ni 'dir gang gi tshe dkyil 'khor gyi rdul tshon rlung gis khyer bar gyur pa de'i tshe bla ma la sogs pa rnams la 'jigs pa gsal bar byed cing yul 'khor dag tu rgyal po 'jigs pa yang
analyzed: 'dir thig skud chad par gyur pa na bla ma nyams par 'gyur zhing yongs 'joms 'gongs par gyur na bu rnams dag kyang nyams par 'gyur ro ; / gal te rdul tshon rlung gis khyer na zhes pa ni 'dir gang gi tshe dkyil 'khor gyi rdul tshon rlung gis khyer bar gyur pa de'i tshe bla ma la sogs pa rnams la 'jigs pa gsal bar byed cing yul 'khor dag tu rgyal po 'jigs pa yang
translated: Here, if the thread breaks, the guru will be ruined, and if the complete destruction is transgressed, the disciples will also be ruined.

original: gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: gsal bar byed do //
translated: If the colored powder is carried away by the wind, when the colored powder of the maṇḍala is carried away by the wind, then the fear of the guru and so on is made clear, and the fear of the king in the country is also made clear.

original: mtshan ma ngan pa de dag mthong nas slar yang slob dpon gyis gtso bo dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya ste slar yang mtshan mar gyur gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma ngan pa de dag mthong nas slar yang slob dpon gyis gtso bo dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya ste slar yang mtshan mar gyur gyi bar du'o //
translated: Having seen those bad signs, again the master should perform the recitation of the mantra of the principal deity until the signs arise again.

original: de nas slar yang mtshan ma rnyed na mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa dag gis thig ni gdab pa bsgrub par bya /
analyzed: de nas slar yang mtshan ma rnyed na mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa dag gis thig ni gdab pa bsgrub par bya /
translated: Then, if the signs are found again, the thread should be established with even and uneven steps.

original: 'dir slob dpon gyi rkang pa g-yon pa skyil krung dang g-yas pa'i mthil sa la bzhag pa mnyam pa'i rkang pa dang de bzhin du bzlog pa mi mnyam pa'i rkang pas thig gdab pa bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir slob dpon gyi rkang pa g-yon pa skyil krung dang g-yas pa'i mthil sa la bzhag pa mnyam pa'i rkang pa dang de bzhin du bzlog pa mi mnyam pa'i rkang pas thig gdab pa bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: Here, the master should establish the line with the left foot in the full lotus posture and the sole of the right foot on the ground, with the feet even, and likewise with the reverse, with the feet uneven. This is the rule.

original: da ni yongs 'joms gsungs pa 'dir shes rab thabs kyi yan lag dbus su yongs 'joms su 'gyur te de ni dkyil 'khor dag la spang bar bya zhes pa la /
analyzed: da ni yongs 'joms gsungs pa 'dir shes rab thabs kyi yan lag dbus su yongs 'joms su 'gyur te de ni dkyil 'khor dag la spang bar bya zhes pa la /

translated: Then, on the forehead, from a white om, Amitabha; on the throat, from a red ah, Ratnasambhava; on the heart, from a black hum, Amoghasiddhi; on the navel, from a yellow ho, Vairochana; on the crown, from a green kham, Akshobhya; and on the secret part, from a blue ksh, Vajrasattva, with the hand implements, colors, and weapons as will be explained, should be arranged.
